data.content:
Danh từ
chùm len hình cầu (trang trí trên mũ)
a bobble hat
có chùm len trên chỏm

verb
bobbles; bobbled; bobbling
[no obj] :to move up and down quickly or repeatedly
a doll with a head that bobbles [=bobs] up and down
[+ obj] US :to handle (something, such as a ball) in a clumsy or awkward way :to fail to catch (something) :fumble
The catcher bobbled the ball.
noun
plural bobbles
[count] US :a mistake that occurs when a player fails to catch or handle the ball properly in baseball, football, etc.
a bobble that cost them the game - sometimes used figuratively
The show went well with only a minor bobble. [=mistake]
chiefly Brit :a small ball of fabric that is used for decoration
The curtains have a series of bobbles along the edge.
a woolly hat with a bobble [=(US) pom-pom] on top
